original_title: Mobile phone found during STF raid at Boossa Prison
original_body_lines: Several contraband items including a mobile phone have been found within the High Security Prison in Boossa, Galle.
Accordingly, a mobile phone, sim card, three phone chargers and three data cables were found hidden inside a wall in a special cell of the prison.
The contraband was found during a raid conducted by the Police Special Task Force (STF) unit of the Boossa Prison.
